name: Data table
semantic_context: Permanently save data across workflow executions in a table
natural_language_description: 这是 Data table 节点。主要用于: Permanently save data across workflow executions in a table

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: row

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: insert
available_options: If Row Exists (值: rowExists) - Match input items that are in the data table
If Row Does Not Exist (值: rowNotExists) - Match input items that are not in the data table
Insert (值: insert) - Insert a new row
Update (值: update) - Update row(s) matching certain fields
Upsert (值: upsert) - Update row(s), or insert if there is no match

dataTableId.name: dataTableId
dataTableId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data table | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

matchType.name: matchType
matchType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Must Match | 默认值: anyCondition

filters.name: filters
filters.description: Filter to decide which rows get
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Conditions | 作用: Filter to decide which rows get | 默认值: {}

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: dryRun (值: None) - Whether the operation simulates and returns affected rows in their "before" and "after" states

columns.name: columns
columns.natural_language_description: 参数名: Columns | 默认值: {'mappingMode': 'defineBelow', 'value': None} | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50
